ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: East karana should also be very good. Group up and do gnoll reavers/undead gnolls. Kill carrion spiders, and get in groups for gorge hounds. Or go to west
ygData.messageBody:
East karana should also be very good. Group up and do
gnoll reavers/undead gnolls. Kill carrion spiders, and
get in groups for gorge hounds. Or go to west karana
and kill scarecrows, they are undead.

Darkmoon Somberlight.

--- Dark <dark@...> wrote:
> Well personally I'd stay in Nro doing dervs
> paticular camp 3 since more
> thugs spawn there until 16. Once you hit 16 head for
> Lake R and do Aviaks.
>
> Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the almost 40th
> Circle
